sentences.en: As far as we're concerned, the matter is settled.
sentences.cn: 我们这边已经安排妥当了。

sentences.en: Do you think this crisis can be settled without going to war?
sentences.cn: 你认为这场危机能和平解决吗？

sentences.en: He got his coffee, came back and settled down to listen.
sentences.cn: 他喝了杯咖啡，回来后开始认真听讲。

sentences.en: He settled back in the rear of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 他靠坐在出租车的后排座上。
他站起身说，“就这么定了。”

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: Jessica settled into her chair with a small sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 杰茜卡微微松了口气，坐到了椅子上。

sentences.en: Now you're settled, why don't you take up some serious study?
sentences.cn: 既然你已经安顿下来了，为什么不开始正经地学点东西呢？

sentences.en: Once its impurities had settled, the oil could be graded.
sentences.cn: 一旦杂质沉淀下去，油就可以分级了。

sentences.en: Once the dust had settled Beck defended his decision.
sentences.cn: 事态一旦平息，贝克就为他的决定辩白。

sentences.en: She was tired of moving around and longed for a more settled existence.
sentences.cn: 她对搬来搬去已经感到厌烦了，很想过一种比较安定的生活。

sentences.en: Some of the traders settled and intermarried with local women.
sentences.cn: 一些商人定居下来，并与当地妇女通婚。

sentences.en: They put up their tents and settled down for the night.
sentences.cn: 他们搭好帐篷，准备过夜。

sentences.en: They settled the land, dispossessing many of its original inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 他们在土地上定居，赶走了许多原来的居民。

sentences.en: They settled with Colin at the end of the evening.
sentences.cn: 晚上聚会结束的时候他们和科林结清了账。

sentences.en: This was one of the first areas to be settled by Europeans.
sentences.cn: 这是欧洲人最早的定居地之一。

words.tran_cn: 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民

trans.tran_cn: 不变的，稳定的，固定的，妥，停当
trans.tran_en: remaining the same, and not likely to change
